Get ESPN's WNBA player box data

espn_wnba_player_box.Rd

Get ESPN's WNBA player box data

espn_wnba_player_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples


 espn_wnba_player_box(game_id = 401244185)

#>    athlete.displayName team.shortDisplayName MIN    FG 3PT  FT OREB DREB REB
